title: Inherit a title
beginning: Take 8 Privilege from the bank into your hand
end: Put 2 Privilege from the bank face down on your deck

title: Privilege
beginning: Draw 2
end: Trash 1 from your hand

title: Fight for Freedom
beginning: Revive the lowest time in play
end: Draw 1 for each dungeon scheme

title: Serve as Sheriff
beginning: Put 3 Privilege from the bank face up on your discard
end: Draw the highest time in play

title: Declare independence
beginning: Take 1 Privilege from the bank into your hand
end: Draw the lowest time in play

title: Frame the hostage
beginning: Revive the highest time in play
end: Draw the lowest rank in the dungeon

title: Found a secret order
beginning: Revive your top discard scheme's time
end: Draw twice the number of colors in play

title: Host a wedding
beginning: If the left 2 timeline schemes are the same color, earn the higher rank
end: If the lowest rank scheme in play is green or yellow, earn 5 gold

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
beginning: Copy the lowest rank yellow scheme in play
end: Copy the lowest rank green or yellow dungeon scheme
threat: If this is the highest rank scheme in play, put it on your discard instead summoning or imprisoning

title: Start a bloodfeud
beginning: Copy the leftmost yellow timeline scheme
end: Copy the highest rank green dungeon scheme
threat: If someone else wins the auction, they must imprison their top discard scheme

title: Call in allies
end: Copy the highest rank yellow scheme in play
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, copy it
threat: If you bid 10 or more, your bid is increased by 10

title: Challenge to a duel
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green or yellow, copy it
end: Copy the lowest rank green or yellow scheme in play
threat: If someone else bids 5 or more, you may bid silver

title: Storm the palace
beginning: If the leftmost timeline scheme is green or yellow, copy it
end: Copy the highest rank green scheme in play
threat: If you won the auction, you may take cards from the dungeon as well as the court

title: Spread the rebellion
beginning: If there are no red timeline schemes, copy the leftmost timeline scheme
end: Copy the highest rank green or yellow scheme in play
threat: If someone else wins the auction, they may not take schemes from the court

title: Plunder the enemy
beginning: If there is a lower rank scheme in play, copy the rightmost yellow timeline scheme
end: Copy the highest rank green or yellow dungeon scheme
threat: If you make no trades, you may reorder the schemes in your deck at the end of the round

title: Defeat the church
beginning: If your top discard scheme is red, copy the leftmost green timeline scheme
end: Otherwise, copy your top discard scheme
threat: If you summon this to the court, copy it

title: Evict the tenants
beginning: If you have 5 or less schemes in hand, earn 25 gold
end: If you earned gold, put 1 scheme from your hand on the bottom of your deck

title: Smuggle contraband
beginning: If your top discard scheme is yellow, earn twice its rank
end: Put your top discard scheme face down on your deck

title: Choose the next Pope
beginning: If your deck or discard is empty, earn 30 gold
end: Summon 1 privilege from the bank to the court

title: Blackmail her Majesty
beginning: Earn the leftmost timeline scheme's rank
end: Earn the highest yellow rank in play

title: Learn ancient alchemy
beginning: Earn twice your top discard scheme's rank
end: If it is not yellow, summon it to the court

title: Marry the Duchess
beginning: Pay five times the left timeline scheme's time in gold
end: Earn twice its rank

title: Collect alms
beginning: Earn 5 gold for each dungeon scheme
end: Earn the rightmost timeline scheme's rank

title: Rule alongside your mother
beginning: If your top discard scheme is green, revive 5
end: If the highest or lowest rank scheme in play is green, draw 5

title: Enclose peasant land
beginning: Earn the lowest green rank in play
end: Revive your entire discard

title: Become a Saint
beginning: If you have 50 or less gold, revive 5
end: If your discard is empty, draw 5
